main event: A bright object was observed hovering in the sky for 10 minutes in Detroit Lakes, Minnesota.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 10 minutes,The object was described as round and black turning to a red glow,The object was approximately the size of a dime at arm's length,The observer was a former jet mechanic in the USAF,The investigation revealed no unusual objects detected by air defense during the sighting period.
witness description: A former jet mechanic in the USAF, aged 29.
